title: Clean Configuration
description: Defines the heft configuration for the clean stage.

$schema.description: Part of the JSON Schema standard, this optional keyword declares the URL of the schema that the file conforms to. Editors may download the schema and use it to perform syntax highlighting.

pathsToDelete.description: Glob patterns to be deleted by the "heft clean" action.  The paths are resolved relative to the project folder. If this setting is not specified, then the default value is: [ "dist", "lib", "temp" ]
